description:
As an appellant
  I want to be able to view the information I submitted to the Planning Inspectorate
  So that I can review the information at anytime
name: Your Appeal Details

elements.name: Add link to the ‘Your planning appeal’ page - appellant

steps.name: an appellant has submitted an appeal
the appellant is on the ‘Your planning appeal’ page
the page will contain a link to ‘View your appeal details’

elements.name: An appellant views the appeal details

steps.name: an appellant is on the 'Your planning appeal' page
the appellant selects the 'View your appeal details' link
the appeal details will be shown - appellant, without files
the user sees the label for appellant name as "Your name"

elements.name: An appellant decides to open all sections

steps.name: an appellant is viewing a valid appeal with all sections closed

elements.name: File count for each document type - appellant

steps.name: an appellant has submitted an appeal that includes multiple documents
a count for each document type will be displayed on the page - appellant

elements.name: ‘Back' link goes back to the previous page￼- appellant

steps.name: an appellant is viewing a valid appeal
the appellant selects the ‘Back’ link
the "Your planning appeal" page will be displayed for the current appeal - appellant

elements.name: Display 400 error page when user session is not set therefore we don’t have the appeal ID

steps.name: an appellant or agent is viewing the appeal details for an invalid appeal ID
the 400 error page will be displayed
